However, using these abilities dredges up memories from the past, and the pain becomes overwhelming. Those who cannot bear the pain eventually transform into monsters.\n\n \n\nA rumor spreads in a school in Seoul about a monster with a head made of flowers living under the bridge behind the school. The school bullies try to force ‘Park Dohyun,’ a quiet student, into the bridge, but his sister intervenes and stops them.\n\n \n\nHowever, on that night, due to pressure from the bullies, Dohyun accidentally witnesses his sister entering the bridge in his place. He hurriedly follows her when he realizes she’s inside, but she meets her end at the hands of the monster within…"},"links":{"mu":"1t9to2k","raw":"https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8E%98%EC%9D%B4%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A9%94%EC%9D%B4%EC%BB%A4/3232"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

89bcfe0b-caa3-4d1b-9679-139b44a0b505:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"89bcfe0b-caa3-4d1b-9679-139b44a0b505","title":{"en":"Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"亡びの国の征服者"},{"ja":"亡びの国の征服者～魔王は世界を征服するようです～"},{"ja-ro":"Horobi no Kuni no Seifukusha: Maou wa Sekai wo Seifukusuru Youdesu"},{"en":"The Conqueror From a Dying Kingdom"},{"en":"Conqueror of Dying Kingdom"},{"en":"The Demon King Seems to Conquer the World"},{"uk":"Король Демонів"},{"uk":"Король Демонів - Підкорювач мертвої землі, - здається, завойовує світ"},{"zh-hk":"亡國的征服者"},{"zh-hk":"亡國的征服者～魔王將征服世界～"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","id"],"description":{"en":"Never having known the warmth of family, he was reborn in another world. Named Yuri, he is doted on by his parents and lives a new life in peace – as it should be. However, the country where Yuri and the others live is threatened by the “other humans” who dominate the vast expanse of the continent and is in danger of dying. Yuri and his family can’t stay out of it and are caught in the middle of the war… The Knights' House, the sword of the kingdom that wields a lance and kakedori birds. The death of his uncle, who was the leader of the Hovu family, brings Yuri’s father back to the world of knights, who had left the house to hate killing each other. Yuri is forced to attend the Knights’ Academy, where knights are trained, and the encounter there will drastically change the fate of Yuri and the kingdom. This is the story of a man who fights for the people he loves and later became known throughout the world as the “Demon King.”\n\n---\nAs a self-professed no-lifer, Yuri idles his days away in front of a computer. This all changes the moment his life in Japan comes to an abrupt end and he finds himself reborn in the strange new world of the Shiyalta Kingdom. His new life includes everything he once lacked: loving parents, a comfortable home, and a promising future breeding and raising birds on his dad’s ranch. For centuries, the kingdom he now calls home has enjoyed peace and prosperity, shielded by friendly nations that, like Shiyalta itself, were established with the collapse of a once-great empire. War is a distant problem, relevant only to Shiyalta’s ruling families whose warriors periodically set out to join the fighting upon massive birds trained by Yuri’s dad and others. But this peaceful existence can’t last forever. Something rotten lies at the heart of the kingdom, and it doesn’t take someone with Yuri’s exceptional intelligence to realize that those distant battles will only remain irrelevant for so long.","ja":"世間に見放された孤独な男は、異世界に転生を果たす。ユーリと名付けられた男は、前世で与えられなかった”家族愛”に戸惑うも、新たな生に希望を見出しつつあった。だが、異種族の侵略を受け戦火は彼と家族の間近にまで迫り!? ユーリは家族のため終わりなき戦いへ身を投じる――。後に世界に名を轟かす男が歩んだ覇道の物語、ここに開幕。","uk":"Людина, що залишила світ наприкінці своєї самотності, перетворилася на немовля Юрі. Для сохранения своего рода человечество возвело научную лабораторию под названием «Халдея». Суть ее существования заключалась в том, чтобы наблюдать за миром при помощи той самой магии и достижений человечества. Благодаря усилиям ученых было подтверждено, что человечеству оставалось жить еще как минимум 100 лет. Однако «Халдея» зафиксировала некую аномалию, в результате которой наблюдаемая лабораторией область будущего внезапно исчезла. Все эти события привели к панике, и ученые принялись изучать полученные данные. Выяснилось, что в городе Фуюки в 2004 году существовала область, которая ни разу за всю историю существования «Халдеи» не попадала в поле ее зрения. Также подтвердилось вымирание человечества уже в 2017 году. По результатам полученных данных «Халдея» принимает решение задействовать программу «Рейшифт». Смысл - отправить группу специально подготовленных людей (Мастеров) в прошлое для ликвидации аномалии. Однако, в лаборатории происходит взрыв, и все Мастера оказываются в критическом состоянии. Одному из них, Рицуке Фудзимару, все же удается попасть в прошлое, где разворачивалась легендарная война за Святой Грааль. Of these, the Seven Heroes halted the invasion to herald a time of prosperity while the four Lances of Betrayal were supposedly defeated.   \nTwo decades later, the Lances of Betrayal have reappeared and formed a bandit militia near the frontier fief Gormbark. A man with a black sword and a scar over his left eye slays an entire troop of that militia. He is identified as the boy, Köinzell, and becomes as much an object of fear as of hope even as his own past, motivations, and purpose are a mystery to those he meets on his journey.\n___\n[Alt Official English](https://yenpress.com/series/ubel-blatt)","pl":"Dwadzieścia lat temu, w czasie wojny z tajemniczym państwem Wischtech, wysłano czternastu bohaterów z misją mającą zagwarantować ich ojczyźnie bezpieczeństwo.. Trzech zginęło w drodze, czterech zdradziło, siedmiu wykonało powierzoną im misję i wróciło w blasku chwały… Za swe zasługi otrzymali władzę, większą, niż byli sobie w stanie wyobrazić.  \n  \nKrążą jednak plotki. Głoszą, że na pograniczu, pod władzą czterech zdrajców, tworzą się nowe oddziały i że przybędzie nowy bohater. A wszystko wskazuje na to, że jest nim niepozorny, półelfi chłopiec…","pt-br":"Existe um conto imperial, que no ano 3968 - quando o Império do Szaalenden ainda estava em guerra com um inimigo poderoso chamado Wischtech - o Imperador enviou 14 jovens para parar a matança. Entretanto, não foram todos que completaram a jornada, durante ela 3 morreram e 4 traíram seus companheiros. Os Sete Heróis que sobraram, detiveram e derrotaram os traidores e completaram a missão impedindo a invasão do exército inimigo ao império. Os sete homens então retornaram e foram recebidos como salvadores, ganhando o título de \"Os Sete Heróis\", enquanto o nome dos traidores foi para sempre manchados com o título de \"As Lanças da Traição\". Esta história, porém, pode ser simplesmente uma fábula. Os \"Sete Heróis\", na verdade, foram covardes, que, após ver o poder do inimigo fugiram. Enquanto corriam de volta para casa, foram os \"Lanças da Traição\" aqueles que de fato bravamente continuaram e completaram a missão. Entretanto, estes mesmo após completarem a missão, na volta para casa, foram encurralados e assassinados pelos desertores covardes que dessa forma tiraram a honra e glória daqueles que completaram a tarefa. Sem saber deste grupo traidor, um deles sobreviveu. Seu nome era Ascheriit, e enquanto ele esperava a morte, sua vida fora salva ao consumir o corpo de uma Fada. Agora, vinte anos se passaram desde a guerra. Ascheriit, após renascer, tomando o nome de Köinzell, retorna ao império para saciar sua vingança contra aqueles que traíram ele e seus amigos. Ao mesmo tempo, lá vem uma palavra de profecia, proclamando que um herói virá da fronteira para impedir uma misteriosa, mortal catástrofe."},"links":{"al":"30070","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0859MJNTL","ap":"ubel-blatt","bw":"series/4086","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/154743/","engtl":"https://global.manga-up.com/manga/415","kt":"178","mal":"70","mu":"2291","raw":"https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/biggangan/introduction/ubel_blatt/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

8a484ffc-05ca-48b2-b6ff-7284a3f0e56c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8a484ffc-05ca-48b2-b6ff-7284a3f0e56c","title":{"en":"808 Machi Hyori - Keshoshi"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"八百八町表裏　化粧師"},{"en":"808 Town Views - Make-Up Specialist"},{"ja-ro":"Hachihyakuhachi Machi Hyori - Keshoshi"}],"lastChapter":"31","description":{"en":"(from ebookjapan):\nThe cosmetics sold by the apothecary Shikitei Shoho are very popular among Edo women, from the landlady of a large store to townswomen. The young master, Shikitei Kosanma, is the most skilled cosmetologist in Edo. Not only does he use makeup to beautify and adorn women, but he also glamorously and flashily arranges the front and back sides of Edo culture! But what a novel technique that could be used in today's advertising industry! Kosaku realizes he has the once in a lifetime opportunity to get to personally know his dream girl and, together with his group of friends, try to find out why she is here and become closer than just classmates.  \n  \nAdaptation of the light novel written by Shiratori Shirow with illustrations by Kippu."},"links":{"al":"78719","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0756ZTS6G","ap":"no-rin","kt":"6268","mal":"48719","mu":"75522"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

8ad0b0e1-2822-4c77-aa46-4c52643bb6be:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8ad0b0e1-2822-4c77-aa46-4c52643bb6be","title":{"en":"Love After Marriage"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"先婚后爱"}],"lastChapter":"127","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"【Translation provided by the copyright owner.】\nMarried for three years, I don't know who my husband is. 8ae91991-e3a4-4c8f-a3dc-3e04b8d11d0e:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8ae91991-e3a4-4c8f-a3dc-3e04b8d11d0e","title":{"en":"X-MEN the Manga"},"altTitles":[{"en":"エックスメン"}],"relatedIdds":["7ca8e4f5-3e59-4d5b-87e7-ee01caeac57e"],"description":{"en":"X-Men: The Manga, published simply as X-Men in Japan published by Marvel Comics. It is a manga adaptation of the 1992 X-Men animated series. It was published directly to tankobon format by Takeshobo in 1994 under their Bamboo Comics imprint in order to promote the Japanese airing of the show. The first volume was published and the publication date is from March 1998 - April 1999. Therefore, manga lasted 13 volumes, each volume adapting two episodes from the TV series (thus covering the first two seasons), with a different manga artist drawing each story. In addition to the books, Takeshobo also published a manga tie-in to the X-Men: Children of the Atom arcade game drawn by Miyako Cojima that was published in Comic Gamma from 1994 to 1995, but was not collected in book form. In 1998, Marvel Comics adapted the manga into English as a monthly title, publishing 26 issues covering the first 13 stories."},"links":{"mal":"15202"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"7064a261-a137-4d3a-8848-2d385de3a99c","name":{"en":"Superhero"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

8af494c5-f47c-48f8-81ee-a94ea9109302:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8af494c5-f47c-48f8-81ee-a94ea9109302","title":{"en":"Odoriba ni Skirt ga naru"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"踊り場にスカートが鳴る"},{"zh-hk":"與妳翩翩共舞"},{"en":"The Skirt Sings at the Landing"},{"en":"The Skirt Rings at the Landing"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br","en","es-la","id"],"description":{"en":"Haruma Kiki always dreamed of doing ballroom dance as the feminine \"follower\" role, but as she aged she only grew taller and taller, eventually causing her to give up ever looking good in a dress or anything ladylike. Now, as a second year in high school, she specializes in the masculine \"leader\" role—until one day, her partner suddenly leaves her. When Toribami Michiru, a short and pretty first year, shows up wanting to join the ballroom dance club, Kiki asks her to be her new partner, but Michiru reveals that she only plays the leader role—and she wants none other than Kiki as her partner.  \n  \nBimonthly serialisation in Yuri Hime.","es-la":"Haruma Kiki siempre soñó con hacer bailes de salón como el papel de \"seguidora\" femenina, pero a medida que pasaban los años solo crecía más y más alta, lo que finalmente hizo que renunciara a verse bien con un vestido o cualquier cosa de dama. Ahora, en su segundo año de secundaria, se especializa en el papel de \"líder\" masculina, hasta que un día, su pareja la abandona de repente. Cuando Toribami Michiru, una pequeña y linda chica de primer año, aparece queriendo unirse al club de baile de salón, Kiki le pide que sea su nueva compañera, pero Michiru revela que ella solo juega el papel de líder, y ella no quiere nada menos que a Kiki como su compañera."},"links":{"al":"122993","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0C4NQ471M","ap":"odoriba-ni-skirt-ga-naru","bw":"series/304893","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2615160","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/642854/A002624693/","kt":"odoriba-ni-skirt-ga-naru","mal":"130417","mu":"171246","raw":"https://ichijin-plus.com/comics/2417154326588"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a3c67850-4684-404e-9b7f-c69850ee5da6","name":{"en":"Girls' Love"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}}]}

8b5e43d2-adc3-483d-bd36-453e472f11b4:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8b5e43d2-adc3-483d-bd36-453e472f11b4","title":{"en":"Sister Blood"},"availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr","en"],"description":{"en":"Since they were kids, Saya has always looked up to her kind, gentle older brother, Shou. He always looked after her, put her needs first, they spent all of their time together, and ultimately he was the only one who was ever there for her. Even without parents, the two of them lived happily, enjoying their peaceful lives together.  \n  \nThat is, until Saya was bitten.  \n  \nWhen bitten by a pure-blooded vampire, the one who was bitten may themself become a vampire, as was the case with Saya. She can't leave the house out of fear that she will feast, and her brother must lock her away to protect her from vampire hunters, such as himself. The only solace she has is being taken care of by her beloved older brother, whom she knows has eyes only for her, and vice-versa.  \n  \nShou, on the other hand, can't stand to see his sister in such a state, locked away in their own home and forced into solitude. And so he has made it his goal to kill the pure-blooded vampire who bit his sister, believing that in doing so he may restore his sister to what she once was. He becomes an expert at hunting vampires, driven by his sole desire to make his sister human again.  \n  \nBut Shou has another reason for wanting to get out of the house. Since she was bitten, Saya has become increasingly obsessed and forceful. She can't stand being mere siblings anymore, and with her actions becoming more forward and deliberate, her brother himself is having a hard time holding back.  \n  \nWill Shou give in?
